mxspjeEz1Zbf7dwHD.name: Oxygen Storage
mxspjeEz1Zbf7dwHD.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

mTboG7srVt4O-s88M.name: Oxygen Storage
mTboG7srVt4O-s88M.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mvURE7IyGvgDAHj5d.name: Oxygen Storage
mvURE7IyGvgDAHj5d.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mOsUH5T6eQP5geT2G.name: Oxygen Storage
mOsUH5T6eQP5geT2G.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mh2lTGF2K8rFU-oix.name: Oxygen Storage
mh2lTGF2K8rFU-oix.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

t3ob1tyZdpbAQke66.name: High Pain Threshold
t3ob1tyZdpbAQke66.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

m6awUWktZw-RTyUwi.name: Diffuse
m6awUWktZw-RTyUwi.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mghW994e7q81q6Rog.name: Homogenous
mghW994e7q81q6Rog.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

m93gApMMDS8Qgsrep.name: No Blood
m93gApMMDS8Qgsrep.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mpdZKtAczLOqDEBwc.name: No Brain
mpdZKtAczLOqDEBwc.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mikQoqXIeHjVDcoE5.name: No Eyes
mikQoqXIeHjVDcoE5.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mR6hWqybTdmNSFEXh.name: No Head
mR6hWqybTdmNSFEXh.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

m-ShuSdUILOTR_ima.name: No Neck
m-ShuSdUILOTR_ima.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mdOnKIqk-s8htW9qG.name: No Vitals
mdOnKIqk-s8htW9qG.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mSiUEoxeZLf3kRZB4.name: Unliving
mSiUEoxeZLf3kRZB4.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
